extendedInfo.description: Flipster is a Facebook client, offering full access to the most important features of the offical Facebook app, just faster and easier to use.It's free, simple & fun!FEATURES:Â» Intuitive touch navigationÂ» Post on your friends walls and update your own statusÂ» Facebook ChatÂ» Post images, checkin and links on your wallÂ» Share your friends posts and imagesÂ» Comment and like postings of your friendsÂ» Browse your newsstreamÂ» Check out your friends profiles/galleries/wallÂ» Beautiful high res image galleryÂ» Facebook notifications that are everywhere accessible via dropdown menuÂ» Send and receive private messages from within the appÂ» Supports Facebook groupsÂ» Includes a birthday calendarÂ» Check upcoming/past events in Flipsters event calendarÂ» RSVP to eventsÂ» See RSVPs of other users to eventsPRO FEATURES:Â» Ad freeFacebook Permissions:Flipster asks you to give multiple Facebook permissions in order to function correctly. Those permissions are only used to show friends profiles, images, newsstream to you.No information will be stored or transferred anywhere but on your own device. We strongly believe that users should have full control over their data and Flipster follows this principle.Support:If you encounter any problems with Flipster, or have any feature suggestions/wishes, please contact me via email at support@flipster-app.comTranslations:If you are missing translations in your language, you can help by suggesting a translation via CrowdinLink: http://crowdin.net/project/flipster-for-facebook/

reviews.title: Better than official version
reviews.comment: I really dislike the official app. Found this and I am so much happier. Will try it out for a couple more days.  If it keeps up, pro version it is.
reviews.author: j norto

reviews.title: 2 More Options?
reviews.comment: Can you make this app Detect the Location? Like the official app..like \"Near London,England\" withouth checking out? And Privacy settings for what we ppst to? Like visibility Friends of Friends..Friends (sorry for my bad english)
reviews.author: Irusha Fernando

reviews.title: Good, but possible bugs
reviews.comment: After talking to the developer both here and via email, installing three times and MUCH experimentation (I\'ve been trying to get notifications for over three hours) it is working. But man, if my factory facebook app worked AT ALL I never would\'ve bothered. Minus one star for finicky install and buggy settings.
reviews.author: Michael Poage

reviews.title: Light weight but unhappy performance
reviews.comment: Since I rooted my phone and threw away the heavy fb app which was eating my memory I opted for this app readin the reviews. But..  New notifications don\'t show up. Very slow.  Sharin pics not possible from others albums. Ve to save them.  Not happy.
reviews.author: Anurag Dabholkar

reviews.title: Awesome! Only needs a couple things
reviews.comment: This app is awesome!!! I have tried so many that I dont like and this one is perfect!!! Only issue is when someone adds a life event I cant open up to see what it is... Also I cant add an emotion to my status or tag more than one person... Plz fix and I will give 5 stars!!!
reviews.author: Patricia Coyoy

reviews.title: Overall good FB App Replacement
reviews.comment: Overall it\'s a exceptional replacement for the FB app. It doesn\'t have a lot of simple tweeks or customization tweeks. But it gets the job done. I don\'t like the in app notifications though.
reviews.author: Omarr Wilson

reviews.title: very good every fb user have it.
reviews.comment: but its give more time to like page or status or photo please less time to like.
reviews.author: Rahul Thange

reviews.title: Great, but
reviews.comment: Notifications don\'t navigate to the post when clicked on. A black white page is shown.
reviews.author: Karanbir Brar

reviews.title: LISTS!!
reviews.comment: Dude your app is great. But i think i\'ll be buying it only after you\'ve included lists and all. Rest everything is great!
reviews.author: Shreesh Ladha

reviews.title: 1 thing I\'d like to see
reviews.comment: Found the Notifications tab. So... privacy options for my posts. I like to select who can see retain posts.
reviews.author: Libni Garcia

reviews.title: super
reviews.comment: app is more better than official app
reviews.author: Gokul Krish

reviews.title: Update killed it
reviews.comment: Can\'t post comments, infinite login windows or they just loop over and over.
reviews.author: Joel Escobar

reviews.comment: Much better than official Facebook app. Runs in background and does not consumes that much battery.\tMuch better than official Facebook app. Runs in background and does not consumes that much battery.
reviews.author: Vinith Menon

reviews.title: Slow
reviews.comment: Can\'t post now
reviews.author: Bodhi Savvtta

reviews.title: Far better than official.
reviews.comment: It\'s a very good app but needs improvement for messaging. Also a proper contact sync could be good. Google\'s new navigation API will look good too. And after improving it a bit you can add Twitter and Google plus support too. Unfortunately i get random FCs sometimes. If you want i can provide you a log or whatever you want. My email: utku.birkan@gmail.com
reviews.author: Utku Birkan

reviews.title: Why its no upgrade button in news feed?
reviews.comment: Everthing is nice...if got the news feed refresh button I think it woll get five stars
reviews.author: DERBIE WONG

reviews.title: Not bad..
reviews.comment: I haven\'t had much time to mess around with it yet, although one thing that caught my attention is having the ability at only being able to refresh every 15 seconds. This is very bad when you\'re on a page that\'s getting slammed with replies. Fix that and I\'m sure that I\'ll be getting more use of this app. Another thing is when it shows someone has posted X amount of photos, it only lets you view one. Otherwise this app seems to work and look better than the officially FB app. Thank you
reviews.author: Mark Schork

reviews.title: Keeps telling me to upgrade
reviews.comment: When I browse Facebook, popups saying I should upgrade to flipster pro appear way too often.
reviews.author: Jordan Liu

reviews.title: This is now the fastest, lightest Fastbook app and runs perfectly!
reviews.comment: Had to uninsall the official Facebook app because it would just make my aging Samsung Galaxy S1 stall to a halt. Then discovered Atrium which took a while to load but then ran very well untill the last update which also brought my phone to a grinding halt. Have just discovered Flipster and found it both loads and runs very quickly on my not-so-powerful phone. Fast, smooth and easy to use. Look no further for a near-fully featured Facebook client. This is the best!
reviews.author: George Cassimatis

reviews.title: Nice but....
reviews.comment: Check in function are not in proper.. U cn only chekin where u cheked in before.. Also chating notifications are not coming evn all notifications r on.. But overall superb..compare to official app
reviews.author: Shiyas Fazal
